title: Where Does Matteo Jorgenson Fit Into Visma’s Multi-Leader Classics Approach?
content:
Jorgenson bullish on tactics: 'I have a much higher chance of winning on the same team as Wout van Aert than I would racing against him.'

Read the full article at Where Does Matteo Jorgenson Fit Into Visma’s Multi-Leader Classics Approach? on Velo.
author: ahood
